text: The men's 100 metres event at the 2005 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Erfurt, Germany, at Steigerwaldstadion on 14 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Oudéré Kankarafou ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Eddy De Lépine ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Stefan Wieser ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July Wind: 2.4m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
